about_the_game:
Every girl dreams of a dollhouse, right?
Doll House is a new DLC pack for Hamster Playground - This time being strongly related to the theme of just a doll house. Among other things, this set will allow you to dress up your hamsters as a band of rock musicians!
It's time to relate to this element by changing your house in a truly rock style.

Doll House DLC includes:
New Costumes for your hamster rock stars.
Items for your house allowing you to turn it into a doll house.
Brand new Quests with unique rewards;
New jobs to do for your Hamsters
